text: David King (born 24 August 1981 in Australia) is a former American football and Australian rules football player. He was signed by the New England Patriots of the National Football League as a punter on 14 April 2010, but was waived by the team on 11 June 2010. ==References== ==External links== *New England Patriots bio Category:1981 births Category:Living people Category:American football punters Category:Australian expatriate sportspeople in the United States Category:Australian players of American football Category:Euroa Football Club players Category:Bundoora Football Club players Category:Australian rules footballers from Victoria (Australia) Category:Footballers who switched code Category:New England Patriots players
title: David King (punter)
